version_description:
* New UI Update
* Bills payment
* Send and Request Money

* New UI Update
* Bills payment
* Send and Request Money

Local-currency-denominated cards (in addition to existing USD denominated cards)
Merchant payments to over 20k global merchants with instant discounts when you use your Barter card to pay merchants like Uber, Arik air, Booking.com, Mall for Africa, SME market hub, etc.
Free Barter to Barter transfers to all users on Barter globally
Increased reach for cheaper real-time transfers from Barter to any bank account globally
Commissions on airtime and bill payments

What's new?
1. We've made it easier to track what you spend money on by giving you better categorization.
2. We redesigned the Card menu to make it easier for you to create & manage your cards.
3. We’ve made some changes to the bill payments menu (Nigeria)
4. We've eased account verification and increased your transaction limits! You now have more ways to verify your account.

What's new?
1. We've made it easier to track what you spend money on by giving you better categorization.
2. We redesigned the Card menu to make it easier for you to create & manage your cards.
3. We’ve made some changes to the bill payments menu (Nigeria)
4. We've eased account verification and increased your transaction limits! You now have more ways to verify your account.
*Bug fixes and improvements
*Bug fixes and improvements

We’ve made it free for you to send money to your friends & family all over Africa.
We have a new home screen, making it easier to use your most loved features.
You can now see all your billers in a simple list view.
We now send you an email when we notice your password changes.
We fixed the currency that shows for Rwanda and Zambian customers.
Card creation is now a minimum of $5
We now show you the days rate for the dollar (Nigeria only) when funding and withdrawing from a card.

We’ve made it free for you to send money to your friends & family all over Africa.
We have a new home screen, making it easier to use your most loved features.
You can now see all your billers in a simple list view.
We now send you an email when we notice your password changes.
We fixed the currency that shows for Rwanda and Zambian customers.
Card creation is now a minimum of $5
We now show you the days rate for the dollar (Nigeria only) when funding and withdrawing from a card.

1. Mobile money is now a default option on the home screen for East Africa & Ghana.
2. Minor Bug fixes

1. Mobile money is now a default option on the home screen for East Africa & Ghana.
2. Minor Bug fixes
Bug Fixes and performance improvements.
Bug Fixes and performance improvements.

We now show you your transfer limit on the app.
You can now see where your existing virtual dollar cards work.
Bug fixes and improvements.

We now show you your transfer limit on the app.
You can now see where your existing virtual dollar cards work.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements
Black Friday promo update, runs till December 4th.
Black Friday promo update, runs till December 4th.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

What’s new:
1. You now have a user handle and can pay other barter users with their user handles e.g. @samdavid
2. You can now receive money via a Barter.me payment link. This helps you receive money in 12 different currencies!
3. You can now send money to Mobile money accounts in Cameroon and Ivory Coast
4. You can now fund with a debit card in Kenya.
5. We noticed the reset password field was really hard to use so we gave it a cleaner look.
fixes:
- If you are on IOS the amount when sending money via bank transfer wasn’t formatted properly we’ve fixed that pesky bug.
- If your transactions took too long before they showed up we’ve fixed that.

What’s new:
1. You now have a user handle and can pay other barter users with their user handles e.g. @samdavid
2. You can now receive money via a Barter.me payment link. This helps you receive money in 12 different currencies!
3. You can now send money to Mobile money accounts in Cameroon and Ivory Coast
4. You can now fund with a debit card in Kenya.
5. We noticed the reset password field was really hard to use so we gave it a cleaner look.
fixes:
- If you are on IOS the amount when sending money via bank transfer wasn’t formatted properly we’ve fixed that pesky bug.
- If your transactions took too long before they showed up we’ve fixed that.
Bug fixes and improvements.
